features: 24-Month Hassle-Free Warranty, Easy to Reach Customer Service

Designed for kids ages 3 to 16, little or older kids, girls, boys, children, toddlers, home/online school, training, long plane or car rides. On-ear headphones have padded soft cushions with a semi-gloss finish for a comfortable fit. The headband is adjustable and flexible to fit most head sizes. The headphones can also be folded in, making it small and compact for easy storage. The cord is a 5 feet long durable nylon braided cable that prevents tangling.
There is NO microphone, remote or volume control on these headphones but you can still speak into the device's mic that you are plugged into. The receiving end will hear you through the device mic's.

Compatible with most smartphones, Chromebooks, iPads, tablets, computers, laptops, Kindle, all Amazon Fire and all 3.5mm audiojack devices for an easy plug in and kid friendly. For Apple iPhones 7 and above, iPad Pro 11 and 12.9 year 2020 models, you will need a lightning to 3.5mm jack adapter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently asked questions : Q: Do these headphones have a mic? A: No, these headphones do not have a mic. Although these headphones do not have a mic, you can still speak into the device that you are plugged into and the receiving end will hear you. Q: Do these headphones work with iPads, Kindle, Chromebooks, and desktop computers? A: Yes, these headphones are compatible with iPads, Kindle, Chromebooks and desktop computers. The connector is a 3.5mm jack. For iPad Pro 11 and 12.9 year 2020 models, you’ll need a lightning to 3.5mm jack adapter. Q: Are these headphones suitable for kids as young as 2 years old? Do they fit adults? A: Yes, these headphones will fit kids ages 2 and up. They will also fit adults. The size on the headband can be adjusted and will fit most kids and adults. Q: Are the earcup paddings removable? A: The earcup paddings can be removed (instructions not provided in the box) but is advised not to remove them. The padding is firmly fixed and does not move easily while wearing them. Q: Are these headphones good to use on airplanes? A: Yes, the sound from these headphones will be loud enough to block out the noise on an airplane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my son for his tablet. They work great. Sound quality is good. Comfortable fit. Good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY happy with these headphones
reviews.reviewText: This is very well made and I only paid $15 making this an absolute bargain in my book..Craftsmanship is outstanding. The materials are superior. Supple, velvety type cloth covering which will prevent irritation. Rounded, sturdy plastic parts which will not cause any scratches and boo-boo's. Stitching and assembly is high quality. The nylon braided is sturdy and attached well to the jack and headphones. And the headphones are very colorful making them easy to find when the kids misplace them. The make of these headphones exceeded my expectations in every way..Sound quality is pretty good. I put the headphones on myself. It captures a good range and has enough bass and treble where/when it matters. These headphones are not a toy when it comes to sound quality..There is no noise bleeding when the kids are using them. I do not let my kids blast the sound and make sure that sound never goes above 60 % of the max or so... But even with my kid 2 feet away listening to K-pop, I do not hear any noise bleeding at all..These headphones are adjustable and fit very well. Surprisingly ergonomically well designed. I tried them on, and they even fit my head without any discomfort. My kids use these headphones hours at a time continuously without complaining that their ears hurt or that the headphones are too tight..These headphones are sturdy... I have two pairs used by a six year old boy and an eight year old girl. The headphones have been thrown, sat on, swung around, pulled and plugged repeatedly, and picked at by kiddy fingers for months without any visible damage..These headphones are very simple to operate and do not come without any fancy bells and whistles like volume control and etc. But why would you want them in the first place? Complexity just adds to the potential for breakage when it comes to kids. You want headphones that work; that even a 6 year old can use; that can take a beating; and are well made, so that they last long. And these headphones fit the bill..One advice... Not for your older teenagers. The 13 year old is going to want something more expensive and "cooler" and not these... These are for up to grade 6 maybe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A tad big for my 5 yo daughter but still works and she will quickly grow into them. Cord is nice and sturdy and doesn’t tangle. Sound quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great headphones for kids
reviews.reviewText: Bought this pair of headphones for our kid to use at school. For the price, they are a good value. He doesn’t use them everyday but they are still working well. They are easy to adjust the sizing and easy to plug in and unplug. The quality of the material is ok, not the highest quality but given the price, still a great value.
